name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Firmware Engineer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I bring a robust set of skills in Embedded C, Embedded C++, and RTOS, critical for developing high-performance firmware solutions. My proficiency in Linux and hardware interfaces like AXI, AHB, and MMU allows me to create secure and efficient embedded systems. I have hands-on experience with DMA operations and secure boot processes, ensuring reliability and integrity in firmware applications. My technical expertise is complemented by my knowledge of cryptographic signatures, anti-rollback mechanisms, and JTAG for effective debugging. I leverage tools such as Git for version control, and I am familiar with Flash Translation Layer, wear-leveling, garbage collection, and ECC to optimize storage solutions. Additionally, I possess strong analytical capabilities in anomaly detection, while my background in Python facilitates effective cross-platform development. My dedication to delivering robust engineering solutions has been demonstrated across diverse sectors, paving the way for innovative technology integration.
